若需看各幣別資料，請先於右上方切換幣別。: ● If you want to view information in different currencies, please switch the currency in the upper right corner first.
根據切換的時間點，數據展示會有所不同，煩請留意。: ● Please note that depending on the time that you selected, the displayed data will vary.
直屬代理: 指自身拉進來的代理: ● Direct Agents: Refers to agents directly recruited by yourself.
下線代理: 指自身拉進來的代理去拉的代理: ● Downline Agents: Refers to agents recruited by yourself who recruit other agents.
直屬會員: 指自身拉進來的會員: ● Direct Users : Refers to users directly recruited by yourself.
下線會員: 指自身下線代理們拉進來的會員: ● Downline Users : Refers to users recruited by your downline agents.
總投注人數: 該區間內自身下線們有進行投注的人數: ● Total Betting Users: The number of people who placed bets within the range you selected.
佔成佣金: 該區間內可拿到的佔成佣金: ● Sharing Commission: The sharing commission that can be received within the range you selected.
轉碼佣金: 該區間內可拿到的轉碼佣金: ● Rolling Commission: The rolling commission that can be received within the range you selected.
總線上下數: 該區間內下線們的上下數總計: ● Total Line Win/Loss:  The sum of the total line's win/loss within the range you selected.
總線轉碼數: 該區間內下線們的轉碼數總計: ● Total Line Rolling: The sum of total the line's rolling within the range you selected.
